content:
DataGridItemAutomationPeer Class

Definition

Exposes DataGridRow types to UI Automation. The DataGridRow may or may not actually exist in memory.

In this Article

public sealed class DataGridItemAutomationPeer : System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer, System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IInvokeProvider, System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IItemContainerProvider, System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider, System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider, System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider

The data item in the stem.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items* collection that is associated with this DataGridItemAutomationPeer.

The DataGridAutomationPeer that is associated with the DataGrid that holds the stem.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items* collection.

GetPattern(PatternInterface)

Returns the object that supports the specified control pattern of the element that is associated with this automation peer.

public override object GetPattern (System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface patternInterface);
patternInterface
PatternInterface

An enumeration value that specifies the control pattern.

Returns
Object

The current DataGridCellItemAutomationPeer object, if patternInterface is a supported value; otherwise, null. For more information, see Remarks.

Remarks

If one of the following cases occurs, this method returns the current DataGridCellItemAutomationPeer object.

  • patternInterface is System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface and the DataGrid that is associated with this DataGridItemAutomationPeer is read-only.

  • patternInterface is System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface and the DataGridRow that is associated with this DataGridCellAutomationPeer can be selected.

  • patternInterface is System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.

  • patternInterface is System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.

IInvokeProvider.Invoke()

Sends a request to activate a control and initiate its single, unambiguous action.

void IInvokeProvider.Invoke ();

This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the DataGridItemAutomationPeer instance is cast to an IInvokeProvider interface.

propertyId
Int32

The property that contains the value to retrieve.

value
Object

The value to retrieve.

Returns

The first item that matches the search criterion; otherwise, null if no items match.

Remarks

This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the DataGridItemAutomationPeer instance is cast to an IItemContainerProvider interface.

This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the DataGridItemAutomationPeer instance is cast to an IScrollItemProvider interface.

This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the DataGridItemAutomationPeer instance is cast to an ISelectionItemProvider interface.

Remarks

This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the DataGridItemAutomationPeer instance is cast to an ISelectionItemProvider interface.

Gets the UI Automation provider that implements ISelectionProvider and acts as the container for the calling object.

This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the DataGridItemAutomationPeer instance is cast to an ISelectionItemProvider interface.

ISelectionProvider.CanSelectMultiple

Gets a value that indicates whether the UI Automation provider allows more than one child element to be selected concurrently.

bool System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider.CanSelectMultiple { get; }
Returns
Boolean

Remarks

This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the DataGridItemAutomationPeer instance is cast to an ISelectionProvider interface.

ISelectionProvider.GetSelection()

Retrieves a UI Automation provider for each child element that is selected.

System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple[] ISelectionProvider.GetSelection ();
Returns

A collection of UI Automation providers.

Remarks

This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the DataGridItemAutomationPeer instance is cast to an ISelectionProvider interface.

ISelectionProvider.IsSelectionRequired

Gets a value that specifies whether the UI Automation provider requires at least one child element to be selected.

bool System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider.IsSelectionRequired { get; }
Returns
Boolean

false in all cases.

Remarks

This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the DataGridItemAutomationPeer instance is cast to an ISelectionProvider interface.
